If you're looking for a way to spruce up your desktop, look no further than Flip Clock of Desktop.

## What is Flip Clock of Desktop?

Flip Clock of Desktop is a simple yet stylish desktop clock for your Windows computer. It provides a unique time-keeping experience by emulating the classic flip clock design. You'll get a retro-style flip clock that flips the time every minute – just like the clocks you might find in a train station or airport.

## Features

- Retro-style flip clock design
- Simple and minimalistic interface
- Customizable background and font colors
- Option to hide/show the seconds display
- Option to launch on startup
- Option to set the clock to always stay on top of other windows

## Benefits

Those who appreciate retro designs and a minimalistic aesthetic will love Flip Clock of Desktop. It provides a refreshing change from the standard digital clock that we're all used to. With its simple interface, it's easy to customize the clock's colors to match your desktop's wallpaper or theme.

Additionally, for those who work with multiple windows open, it can be helpful to have the clock set to always stay on top. This ensures that you always have access to the time, regardless of what else you're working on.

## How to Get It

Flip Clock of Desktop is a free software. You can easily download it from the official website, [flipclockofdesktop.com](https://www.flipclockofdesktop.com/).

Once you have downloaded and installed the software, the clock will automatically appear on your desktop. From there, you can customize the clock's colors and settings to your liking.

## Conclusion

Overall, Flip Clock of Desktop provides a unique way to display the time on your computer. Its retro design and simple interface make it a great addition to any desktop. Give it a try – you might just find that you prefer the flip clock design over the traditional digital clock.
